item.description:
I know this is kinda last minute, but I heard this sunday is going to be a perfect day for a hike. So I couldn't resist. I've been dying to check out the Fells for awhile, so why not? :)

The Middlesex Fells is only a short drive away from Boston, but it is full of beautiful landscape of rocky hills, meadows, wetlands, oak and hickory forests, quiet ponds, vernal pools, panoramic vistas.
It looks like Spot Pond offers sailing, kayak, canoe and rowboat rentals. So we can check that out too if people want.

I'm pretty new at hiking, (but my boyfriend, Lucas is an experienced hiker) so I'd like to take it easy with this hiking, but more advance hikers are welcome too!
I think for now we can shoot for 2~3 mile loop trail, but we can decide the trail when we meet up at the parking lot.

Bring water, bug spray, snacks and nice sturdy shoes (hiking boots prefered, no flats ladies)

http://www.fells.org/...
http://www.mass.gov/d...
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Sun or call (will send out my number to the RSVPs)
item.name: Easy hike at the Middlesex Fells
